TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Fenglin, title = Fenglin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fenglin} }

S.FORM: Fenglin gu icuwa i kalinku(Hualien). ala atjunangn mapuljat 127.45 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 1.5 km², ma'linaule atjunang 9.08 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 1,855 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 763 a daceneqlan, Amis (60%) a maqcuwa caucau. siaya uta tamaza a fenglin a marlimu na kakaian se pangcah(amis). a i pasakacedas tua fakong(fengbin gu); a i pasakaledep tua malibasi(wanrung gu); a i pasaviri tua alupalan (shoufeng gu); a i pasanavalj tua fata'an(guangfu gu). kaizuazuan na caucau se kacalisian imaza. izua caucau se pangcah(amis), se sakizaya, se truku. kakaian imaza a amis, sakizaya, truku, kata nginaingaian. ngaingai aicu a 60% a caucau a tjatjuruvu imaza i pasakacedas tua taiwan. na pazangal a papupicul taicu a kakudkudan na ngaingai imaza. kadjunangan lialiaw a veljeluan imaza. kemasi ta kaledep a patje imaza i kacedas a veljeluan aicu a yayung ciyakang(chyakan), pasaviri a cincuy a veljeluan, fenglin a veljeluan, mariu(wanli a veljeluan), mataian a veljeluan, katazumazuma. cinalivatan cauicauyanga a pinapungadan nia pangcah (caucau se amis) imaza a marlimu. mavan a siayaya taicu a calisilisi a ngadan a marlimu. paljavak tua atjunang matja 12 qinaljan i Fenglin. matja 6 qinaljan imaza, Cingaroan , Cirakayan , Cihafayan , Sariwsiw , Tangahang , Cilo'ohay . caucau inika matjuruvu a caucau imaza i fenglin. ljakua tjatjuruvu a caucau imaza ta caucau i guanshan i valangaw kata caucau i jiji i lamtaw. mapida a caucau i li a malji tatuluan izua pitju a gakku na kukumin. izua tjelu a gakku na kutjung. kakipucemelan izau pitju a kakipucemelan imaza i fenglin. sipacacikeljan kisiya ljaljevavavan a linrong shin kong ljaljevavavan a nanping ljaljevavavan a fenglin ljaljevavavan a wanrong palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimuluq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 193 a palidring a djalan na kalingeku king basu basu a taroko basu a kalingeku(Hualien Transportation Bus)

Fenglin go icowa i kalinko(Hoalien). ala atjonangn mapoljat 127.45 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 1.5 km², ma'linaole atjonang 9.08 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 1,855 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 763 a daceneqlan, Amis (60%) a maqcowa caocao. siaya ota tamaza a fenglin a marlimo na kakaian se pangcah(amis). a i pasakacedas toa fakong(fengbin go); a i pasakaledep toa malibasi(wanrong go); a i pasaviri toa alopalan (shoofeng go); a i pasanavalj toa fata'an(goangfo go). kaizoazoan na caocao se kacalisian imaza. izoa caocao se pangcah(amis), se sakizaya, se troko. kakaian imaza a amis, sakizaya, troko, kata nginaingaian. ngaingai aico a 60% a caocao a tjatjorovo imaza i pasakacedas toa taiwan. na pazangal a papopicol taico a kakodkodan na ngaingai imaza. kadjonangan lialiaw a veljeloan imaza. kemasi ta kaledep a patje imaza i kacedas a veljeloan aico a yayong ciyakang(chyakan), pasaviri a cincoy a veljeloan, fenglin a veljeloan, mario(wanli a veljeloan), mataian a veljeloan, katazomazoma. cinalivatan caoicaoyanga a pinapongadan nia pangcah (caocao se amis) imaza a marlimo. mavan a siayaya taico a calisilisi a ngadan a marlimo. paljavak toa atjonang matja 12 qinaljan i Fenglin. matja 6 qinaljan imaza, Cingaroan , Cirakayan , Cihafayan , Sariwsiw , Tangahang , Cilo'ohay . caocao inika matjorovo a caocao imaza i fenglin. ljakoa tjatjorovo a caocao imaza ta caocao i goanshan i valangaw kata caocao i jiji i lamtaw. mapida a caocao i li a malji tatoloan izoa pitjo a gakko na kokomin. izoa tjelo a gakko na kotjong. kakipocemelan izao pitjo a kakipocemelan imaza i fenglin. sipacacikeljan kisiya ljaljevavavan a linrong shin kong ljaljevavavan a nanping ljaljevavavan a fenglin ljaljevavavan a wanrong palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimoloq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 193 a palidring a djalan na kalingeko king baso baso a taroko baso a kalingeko(Hoalien Transportation Bos)
